entities.name: the riddle house
entities.description: The main location where the story is taking place. It is mentioned as 'THE RIDDLE HOUSE' in all capital letters.

entities.name: frank
entities.description: A person who is present in the house and can hear voices from another room. He is described as having sparse hairs on his neck stand up when he hears a cold voice.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A man with a high-pitched and cold voice who is present in the house. He is addressed by Frank as 'My Lord'.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: A snake that belongs to Wormtail. It has set out to explore the house.

entities.name: bottle
entities.description: An object being put down on a hard surface.

relationships.description: Wormtail owns Nagini, as mentioned in the text: 'You will milk her before we retire'.
Frank can hear Wormtail's voice from another room.
